data.message: As a man i see through the bullshit marshall i see it from a mile away. You scared marshall, in your heart and your soul no matter how much you hate trump you and i damn well know donald trump will not be impeached. Your scared marshall your scared because you are sensing your fame is slipping through your fingers. You scared That this country will never be the utopia that the people pay you say is going to happen. You scared that at the end of the day the masses will forever know you as a cum bucket for the democratic establishment and nothing else. You rap about all "to any of my fans who support him F()k you!!!"................ phony when your album sales drop Dr. dre  wont be able to save you. So guess what you drew that line and now there is no going back.

replies.message: Yea totally scared when he once again gets nominated for awards even after doing nothing and his albums back on the top 20 best sellers yep totally!
